price: Und Allah weiß, was ihr geheimhaltet und was ihr offenlegt.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
